00017 Player::Player(PlayManager* playManager, std::string name, std::string model) : Object(playManager)
00018 {
00019     // Rendue
00020     Open(model);
00021 
00022     // Attributes
00023     m_name = name;
00024     m_playManager = playManager;
00025     m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.end();
00026     m_killed = false;
00027     m_boostAvalaible = true;
00028     m_boostStopped = false;
00029     m_visibleFromIA = true;
00030     m_score = 0;
00031     m_life = 100;
00032     m_attachedCotroller = NULL;
00033     m_soundManager = playManager->manager.sound;
00034 
00035     // Effet explosion
00036     m_deadExplode = new BurningEmitter(playManager->parallelscene.particles);
00037     m_deadExplode->SetTexture(PARTICLE_EXPLODE);
00038     m_deadExplode->SetLifeInit(m_worldSettings.playerExplodeLifeInit);
00039     m_deadExplode->SetLifeDown(m_worldSettings.playerExplodeLifeDown);
00040     m_deadExplode->SetFreeMove(m_worldSettings.playerExplodeFreeMove);
00041     m_deadExplode->SetNumber(m_worldSettings.playerExplodeNumber);
00042     m_deadExplode->SetAutoRebuild(false);
00043     m_deadExplode->SetParent(this);
00044 
00045     m_checkMe.push_back(new StartProtection(this));
00046 
00047     // Physique
00048     m_physicBody->BuildSphereNode(m_worldSettings.playerSize, m_worldSettings.playerMasse);
00049 
00050     SetRandomSpawnPos();
00051 
00052     NewtonBodySetLinearDamping(m_physicBody->GetBody(), m_worldSettings.playerLinearDamping);
00053     NewtonBodySetAutoSleep(m_physicBody->GetBody(), false);
00054 
00055     // Arme principale
00056     WeaponBlaster* blaster = new WeaponBlaster(m_playManager);
00057 
00058     AddWeapon(blaster);
00059 }

00074 void Player::SetRandomSpawnPos()
00075 {
00076     Vector3f randPos;
00077 
00078     Vector3f::Array& spawns = m_playManager->map.spawnPoints;
00079 
00080     if(spawns.empty())
00081     {
00082         float factor = 5 * m_playManager->map.aabb.GetSize() / 100;
00083 
00084         do
00085         {
00086             randPos = tools::rand(m_playManager->map.aabb - Vector3f(factor));
00087             randPos.y = 1;
00088             randPos = m_physicBody->GetParallelScene()->FindFloor(randPos);
00089         }
00090         while(randPos.y < m_playManager->map.aabb.min.y);
00091     }
00092 
00093     else
00094     {
00095         randPos = spawns.back();
00096 
00097         spawns.pop_back();
00098         spawns.insert(spawns.begin(), randPos);
00099     }
00100 
00101     m_physicBody->SetVelocity(0);
00102     m_physicBody->SetMatrix(randPos);
00103 }

00106 {

00108         if(!m_checkMe[i]->OnTakeItems(this, item))
00109             return;
00110 
00111     item->ModifPlayer(this);
00112 }

00124 void Player::Process()
00125 {
00126     if(!m_enable)
00127         return;
00128 
00129     Object::Process();
00130 
00131     if(m_playManager->IsGameOver())
00132         return;
00133 
00134     if(!m_boostAvalaible)
00135     {
00136         if(clocks.boostDisableBlur.IsEsplanedTime(1000))
00137             m_playManager->HudBoost(false);
00138 
00139         if(clocks.boostAvailable.IsEsplanedTime(m_worldSettings.playerBoostReload))
00140             m_boostAvalaible = true;
00141     }
00142 
00143     if(m_attachedCotroller && !m_killed)
00144         m_attachedCotroller->Process(this);
00145 
00146     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_checkMe.size(); i++)
00147         if(m_checkMe[i]->Shutdown(this))
00148             delete m_checkMe[i], m_checkMe[i] = NULL;
00149 
00150     CheckMe::Array::iterator newEnd = remove(m_checkMe.begin(), m_checkMe.end(), (CheckMe*)NULL);
00151     m_checkMe.erase(newEnd, m_checkMe.end());
00152 }
00153 
00154 bool Player::Shoot(Vector3f targetpos)
00155 {
00156     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_checkMe.size(); i++)
00157         if(!m_checkMe[i]->OnShoot(this))
00158             return false;
00159 
00160     return (*m_curWeapon)->Shoot(m_matrix.GetPos(), targetpos);
00161 }

00163 void Player::Jump()
00164 {
00165     NewtonBodyAddImpulse(m_physicBody->GetBody(), Vector3f(0, m_worldSettings.playerJumpForce, 0), m_matrix.GetPos());
00166 }
00167 
00168 void Player::Boost()
00169 {
00170     if(m_boostAvalaible && !m_physicBody->GetApplyForce().IsNull())
00171     {
00172         m_boostAvalaible = false;
00173 
00174         Vector3f impulseDeri = m_physicBody->GetApplyForce().Normalize()
00175                 * m_worldSettings.playerBoostSpeed;
00176 
00177         impulseDeri.y = 0;
00178 
00179         NewtonBodyAddImpulse(m_physicBody->GetBody(), impulseDeri, m_matrix.GetPos());
00180 
00181         m_soundManager->Play("boost", this);
00182 
00183         clocks.boostStop.SnapShoot();
00184         clocks.boostAvailable.SnapShoot();
00185 
00186         clocks.boostDisableBlur.SnapShoot();
00187         m_playManager->HudBoost(true);
00188 
00189         m_boostStopped = false;
00190     }
00191 
00192     else
00193     {
00194         long estime = clocks.boostStop.GetEsplanedTime(false);
00195 
00196         if(estime > 200 && estime < 3000 && !m_boostStopped)
00197         {
00198             m_boostStopped = true;
00199             m_physicBody->SetVelocity(0);
00200             clocks.boostStop.SnapShoot();
00201 
00202             m_soundManager->Play("stop", this);
00203         }
00204     }
00205 }

00207 inline bool IsWeaponSameName(Weapon* w1, Weapon* w2)
00208 {
00209     return w1->GetWeaponName() == w2->GetWeaponName();
00210 }

00212 void Player::AddWeapon(Weapon* weapon)
00213 {
00214     Weapon::Array::iterator select = find_if(m_weaponsPack.begin(), m_weaponsPack.end(),
00215                                              bind2nd(ptr_fun(IsWeaponSameName), weapon));
00216 
00217     if(select != m_weaponsPack.end())
00218     {
00219         (*select)->UpAmmoCount(weapon->GetAmmoCount());
00220         delete weapon;
00221     }
00222 
00223     else
00224     {
00225         m_weaponsPack.push_back(weapon);
00226 
00227         m_curWeapon = --m_weaponsPack.end();
00228         (*m_curWeapon)->SetShooter(this);
00229 
00230         m_playManager->manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(weapon);
00231     }
00232 }
00233 
00234 void Player::SlotWeapon(unsigned slot)
00235 {
00236     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_weaponsPack.size(); i++)
00237         if(m_weaponsPack[i]->GetSlot() == slot)
00238         {
00239             m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.begin() + i;
00240             break;
00241         }
00242 }
00243 
00244 void Player::SwitchUpWeapon()
00245 {
00246     m_curWeapon++;
00247 
00248     if(m_curWeapon >= m_weaponsPack.end())
00249         m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.begin();
00250 }
00251 
00252 void Player::SwitchDownWeapon()
00253 {
00254     m_curWeapon--;
00255 
00256     if(m_curWeapon < m_weaponsPack.begin())
00257         m_curWeapon = --m_weaponsPack.end();
00258 }

00260 void Player::SetCurWeapon(unsigned slot)
00261 {
00262     if(slot >= m_weaponsPack.size())
00263         throw tbe::Exception("PlayerEngine::SetCurWeapon; Invalid weapon slot (%d)", slot);
00264 
00265     m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.begin() + slot;
00266 }

00273 void Player::ReBorn()
00274 {
00275     m_life = 100;
00276     m_killed = false;
00277 
00278     m_boostAvalaible = true;
00279 
00280     m_playManager->manager.material->SetGhost(this, false);
00281 
00282     SetVisible(true);
00283 
00284     m_physicBody->SetFreeze(false);
00285 
00286     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_weaponsPack.size(); i++)
00287         delete m_weaponsPack[i];
00288 
00289     m_weaponsPack.clear();
00290 
00291     WeaponBlaster* blaster = new WeaponBlaster(m_playManager);
00292 
00293     AddWeapon(blaster);
00294 
00295     SetRandomSpawnPos();
00296 
00297     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_checkMe.size(); i++)
00298         m_checkMe[i]->AfterReborn(this);
00299 
00300     m_checkMe.push_back(new StartProtection(this));
00301 }
00302 
00303 void Player::Kill()
00304 {
00305     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_checkMe.size(); i++)
00306         if(!m_checkMe[i]->OnKilled(this))
00307             return;
00308 
00309     m_killed = true;
00310     m_life = 0;
00311 
00312     m_deadExplode->Build();
00313 
00314     m_playManager->manager.material->SetGhost(this, true);
00315 
00316     clocks.readyToDelete.SnapShoot();
00317 
00318     SetVisible(false);
00319 
00320     m_physicBody->SetFreeze(true);
00321 
00322     m_soundManager->Play("kill", this);
00323 
00324     if(this == m_playManager->GetUserPlayer())
00325     {
00326         m_playManager->GetBullettime()->SetActive(false);
00327 
00328         m_playManager->HudBoost(false);
00329         m_playManager->HudBullettime(false);
00330     }
00331 }

00393 void Player::TakeDammage(Bullet* ammo)
00394 {
00395     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_checkMe.size(); i++)
00396         if(!m_checkMe[i]->OnTakeDammage(this, ammo))
00397             return;
00398 
00399     m_life = max(m_life - ammo->GetDammage(), 0);
00400 
00401 
00402     Weapon* wp = ammo->GetWeapon();
00403 
00404     if(wp)
00405     {
00406         Player* striker = wp->GetShooter();
00407 
00408         if(m_life <= 0)
00409         {
00410             striker->UpScore(10);
00411             UpScore(-10);
00412             Kill();
00413         }
00414         else
00415         {
00416             striker->UpScore(2);
00417             UpScore(-2);
00418         }
00419     }
00420 
00421     if(m_playManager->GetUserPlayer() == this)
00422         m_playManager->HudDammage(true);
00423 
00424     m_soundManager->Play("hit", this);
00425 }

00432 Player::StartProtection::StartProtection(Player* player)
00433 {
00434     using namespace tbe;
00435     using namespace tbe::scene;
00436 
00437     HardwareBuffer& hb = player->GetHardwareBuffer();
00438 
00439     Vertex* vs = hb.Lock();
00440     for(unsigned i = 0; i < hb.GetVertexCount(); i++)
00441         vs[i].color.w = 0.25;
00442     hb.UnLock();
00443 
00444     Material::Array mats = player->GetAllMaterial();
00445 
00446     for(unsigned i = 0; i < mats.size(); i++)
00447         mats[i]->Enable(Material::BLEND_MOD);
00448 
00449     player->SetVisibleFromIA(false);
00450 }

00462 bool Player::StartProtection::Shutdown(Player* player)
00463 {
00464     using namespace tbe;
00465     using namespace tbe::scene;
00466 
00467     if(m_clock.IsEsplanedTime(player->m_playManager->worldSettings.playerStartImmunity))
00468     {
00469         HardwareBuffer& hb = player->GetHardwareBuffer();
00470 
00471         Vertex* vs = hb.Lock();
00472         for(unsigned i = 0; i < hb.GetVertexCount(); i++)
00473             vs[i].color.w = 1;
00474         hb.UnLock();
00475 
00476         Material::Array mats = player->GetAllMaterial();
00477 
00478         for(unsigned i = 0; i < mats.size(); i++)
00479             mats[i]->Disable(Material::BLEND_MOD);
00480 
00481         player->SetVisibleFromIA(true);
00482 
00483         return true;
00484     }
00485 
00486     return false;
00487 }
